meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Katz Sue Nelson Alec Iorio Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #941.

td.p: Alec Iorio, an international freight forwarder originally from St. Louis, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,000)

tr.td: THE OLD WEST
SAINTS
SPORTS
MOVIE TRIVIA
COLORS
THE TELEPHONE

[Laughter]

(Paul: Worth a shot, worth a try.)

Beetlejuice

Paul
')
